tweet: video, music, and a whole new look. just shipped LTX-2, ElevenMusic, and Imagen 3 wrapped in a fresh UI redesign. 39 PRs merged to give you better tools. open source, no subscriptions, just raw creative power. go build.
alt_tweet: 39 PRs later, we've got a new UI and major model upgrades. LTX-2 for video, ElevenMusic for audio, and OVH Whisper for transcription. the platform is evolving fast. come see what open source ai can do.
image_prompt: Dynamic pixel art composition. Center: The Pollinations bee mascot holding a glowing pixel tool, surrounded by swirling creative elementsâ€”video tape reels, music notes, colorful canvases. Background: Bold lime green (#ecf874) rays radiating outward against a deep purple space. High contrast, energetic 'item get' pose from retro RPGs. Soft warm lighting, chunky pixels. Cozy 8-bit aesthetic.
reasoning: Highlights the major multi-modal releases (video/audio) and the UI redesign, which are high-impact updates for users. The tone is confident and builder-focused ('go build').
